byline.original: By JONATHAN MAHLER and NICK CORASANITI

abstract: Question of what will happen with online army of supporters of Sen Bernie Sanders's presidential campaign has been raised in light of fact that he is unlikely to win Democratic nomination; it remains unclear whether Sanders' supporters will work to help Clinton win general election, as his legion of fans view themselves less as Democrats than as revolutionaries.

headline.print_headline: Sanders’s Social Media Foot Soldiers Consider Their Next Campaign
headline.main: Bernie Sanders’s Online Foot Soldiers Weigh Their Next Campaign

snippet: If Mr. Sanders ends his presidential bid, he will leave behind an army unmatched in size, influence and capabilities. The question is whether, and how hard, they would work for Hillary Clinton.
lead_paragraph: If Mr. Sanders ends his presidential bid, he will leave behind an army unmatched in size, influence and capabilities. The question is whether, and how hard, they would work for Hillary Clinton.
